description: Housed in a recently renovated 18C mill on the banks of the Meschio river, this restaurant is run by brothers Giuseppe (front of house) and Adriano (in the kitchen), who serve top-quality cuisine with its roots in local traditions and the occasional imaginative twist with warmth and professionalism. It is even more appealing in summer, when meals are served on the beautiful outdoor terrace.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
